section.title: Computer Algebra System PARI
section.para: This package offers an &ffi-pac;-based interface to &pari-link;.
section.simpara: When this module is present, &features-my; contains the symbol :PARI.
section.para: PARI objects are printed and read using a special #Z"" syntax.
Most functions accept lisp objects as well as PARI objects and return PARI objects, which can be converted to lisp using the pari:pari-to-lisp function.
